title: Christie Brinkley sports a chic trench with leggings as she jets out of LA airport with son Jack
text:
She stepped out of the Dancing With The Stars competition before it even began after injuring her wrist last month.

But Christie Brinkley put any dancing woes behind her as she headed for a flight out of Los Angeles International airport on Tuesday afternoon.

The 65-year-old stunner looked impossibly chic as she followed her son Jack, 24, into the terminal wearing a beige trench coat with leggings.

Cheese: Christie Brinkley put any dancing woes behind her as she headed for a flight out of Los Angeles International airport on Tuesday afternoon

Christie kept warm in an over-sized jacket with a belt hanging loosely by her sides and thick black buttons running vertically down her chest.

She stayed comfortable in tight black leggings paired with leather paneled trainers with thick white soles.

The supermodel showed off a glowing complexion with just a hint of red lipstick swiped onto her lips.

Let's fly! The 65-year-old stunner looked impossibly chic as she followed her son Jack, 24, into the terminal wearing a beige trench coat with leggings

She wore her platinum blonde tresses styled in loose curls and carried her iPhone in one hand while partially hiding her arm brace on the other.

Jack wore a denim jacket with sweats and played a helping hand as he carried his mother's bright red leather tote into the airport.

Christie recently enjoyed a fun-filled day at the happiest place on Earth with two of her children, while oldest daughter Alexa Ray missed out on the Disneyland adventure.

Family first: Christie recently enjoyed a fun-filled day at the happiest place on Earth with two of her children, while oldest daughter Alexa Ray missed out on the Disneyland adventure

Despite her injury, she's made sure to cheer on her youngest daughter Sailor who filled-in for her mom as a celebrity dancer on the popular ABC show.

Fifth Harmony's Ally Brooke and her professional dance partner, Sasha Farber, are currently on the top of the leader-board with a total of 56 points, while Sailor and her partner Valentin 'Val' Chmerkovskiy have 54.

Sailor and Val performed as Cinderella and Prince Charming on Monday night's Disney-themed extravaganza.
description: The 65-year-old stunner looked impossibly chic as she followed her son Jack, 24, into the terminal wearing a beige trench coat with leggings.
